Home page

Welcome to the home page of my website.

I am a PhD student at INSA Rennes working with the IETR laboratory supported by ANR Dark Era. My thesis focuses on the rapid prototyping of application running on HPC systems.

I received the Engineering and Master degrees Innovative electronics and technology design in a work-study program with Yaskawa at INSA Rennes, France, in 2021.
